name: OVM_L2StandardTokenFactory
description: OVM_L2StandardTokenFactory. Factory contract for creating standard L2 token representations of L1 ERC20s compatible with and working on the standard bridge. Compiler used: optimistic-solc Runtime target: OVM.

eventDecorators.name: StandardL2TokenCreated
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

functionDecorators.name: createStandardL2Token
functionDecorators.description: Creates an instance of the standard ERC20 token on L2.

parameterDecorators.name: _l1Token
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the corresponding L1 token.
